results.title: Use of metformin in patients with sickle cell disease.

results.title: Association between clinical outcomes and metformin use in adults with sickle cell disease and diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was recently found to increase fetal hemoglobin, which is protective in @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@sickle cell disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@SCD@@@).

results.title: Metformin induces FOXO3-dependent fetal hemoglobin production in human primary erythroid cells.
results.text_hl: Collectively, our data implicate @GENE_FOXO3 @GENE_2309 @@@FOXO3@@@ as a positive regulator of @GENE_HBG1 @GENE_3047 @@@gamma-globin@@@ expression and identify @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a potential therapeutic agent for @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@SCD@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang Y, Paikari A, Sumazin P, Ginter Summarell CC, Crosby JR, Boerwinkle E, Weiss MJ, Sheehan VA. Metformin induces FOXO3-dependent fetal hemoglobin production in human primary erythroid cells. Blood. 2018 Jul 19;132(3):321-333. PMID: 29884740
